Coleen Nolan has revealed that young men have been sending her outrageously filthy pictures.

The Loose Women were discussing the fear of being 'love scammed' when Coleen made the hilarious confession.

The 54-year-old, who has a teenager daughter and two sons in their 20s, admitted young lads had been sending her saucy snaps ever since she became single.

Coleen said: "Can I share something with you now that's been happening to me since I became single. Don't tell anyone this outside of this room.

"I am getting a lot of messages and pictures sent by very young men showing me..."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

While she struggled to work out how to put it without offending anyone at home, Ruth Langsford asked: "How much they like you?"

Finding a way to explain it on daytime TV, Coleen continued: "Oh how much they got."

Gloria Hunniford then cheekily asked whether Coleen had ever been tempted by the rude photos.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

"Never," cried Coleen, who revealed all the young men were in there late 20s and 30s.

Explaining why, she said: "Firstly if I was Coleen Smith working such and such you wouldn’t be sending me these pictures. I just don't believe them.

"I always want to go I'm 54, I've got children as old as you, I've seen it all before."

Revealing how to charm her, Coleen added: "I just want to go for a nice meal."

(Image: ITV)

Loose Women viewers took to Twitter after hearing Coleen's hilarious confession.

One viewer said: "Coleen getting the d*** pics"

"Come on fellas own up who’s sending coleen d*** pics," added another.

A third joked: "It must be keith lemon sending nolan d*** pix"

*Loose Women airs weekdays on ITV at 12.30pm
description: The Loose Women panellist confessed cheeky young lads have been sending her some very saucy snaps ever since she became single
